com.jjoe64.graphview.helper

Class DateAsXAxisLabelFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jjoe64.graphview.DefaultLabelFormatter
      • com.jjoe64.graphview.helper.DateAsXAxisLabelFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LabelFormatter

    public class DateAsXAxisLabelFormatter
extends DefaultLabelFormatter
    Helper class to use date objects as x-values. This will use your own Date Format or by default the Android default date format to convert the x-values (that has to be millis from 01-01-1970) into a formatted date string. See the DateAsXAxis example in the GraphView-Demos project to see a working example.

    • Field Summary

      Fields
